TopicTitle: How do I "widen" the stance of launch clamps?

Articles.Content:
I could swear I've seen the answer to this somewhere, but I can't find it again.

How, when I'm placing the clamps in the VAB, do I widen (horizontally) the clamps' position?

Thanks much!
I think the only way is to put a decoupler on your rocket, a girder on the decoupler, and the clamp on the end of the girder.
The small hardpoint decouplers works well as launch clamp extensions, Kerbal Attachment System mod also has an explosive bolt for the same purpose.
